action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A bedroom with a bed, two lamps, and a nightstand. The bed has a white comforter and two white pillows. The lamps have white shades. The nightstand has a lamp and a bottle on it. The walls are painted white and there are three paintings hanging above the bed. The floor is made of wood.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: A bedroom with a large wooden bed, a patterned bedspread, two lamps on nightstands, and a framed picture on the wall.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A bedroom with a bed, two lamps, and a nightstand. The bed has a white comforter and two white pillows. The lamps have white shades. The nightstand has a lamp and a bottle on it. The walls are painted white and there are three paintings hanging above the bed. The floor is made of wood.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any lamps with white shades in your image?

This is my DESCRIPTION: A bedroom with a large wooden bed, a patterned bedspread, two lamps on nightstands, and a framed picture on the wall.
QUESTION: Are there any lamps with white shades in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the bedspread patterned in your image?

ANSWER: Yes
QUESTION: Is the bedspread patterned in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: Yes
